mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.ceragem.batch.crm.dao.AdvnCmtDao.getAdmtList */ ITG_CUST_NO , RNUM , MSHIP_ADVNCMT_SCORE , OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM2 , NOW_MSHIP_TYPE_CD , NOW_MSHIP_GRADE_CD , MSHIP_PLCY_BAS_NO , MSHIP_GRADE_CD , MSHIP_EXPT_GRADE_CD , NOW_ADVNCMT_STA_SCORE , NOW_ADVNCMT_END_SCORE , ADVNCMT_STA_SCORE , ADVNCMT_END_SCORE , EXTRC_STD_MONTH , EXTRC_STD_2_MONTH , REG_DT , EXTRC_KEEP_MONTH , NOW_GRADE_KEEP_SCORE , NOW_GRADE_KEEP_2_SCORE , GRADE_KEEP_SCORE , GRADE_KEEP_2_SCORE , APPLY_STD_STA_YMD , APPLY_STD_END_YMD , CHK_KEEP , UP_MONTH_YN FROM (
SELECT A.ITG_CUST_NO , ROWNUM RNUM , A.OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM MSHIP_ADVNCMT_SCORE , A.OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM2 , A.MSHIP_TYPE_CD NOW_MSHIP_TYPE_CD , A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD NOW_MSHIP_GRADE_CD , C.MSHIP_PLCY_BAS_NO , C.MSHIP_GRADE_CD /* , C.MSHP_GRADE_CD MSHIP_EXPT_GRADE_CD */
, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(A.OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM2) >= TO_NUMBER(A.GRADE_KEEP_SCORE) AND C.MSHP_GRADE_CD < A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD THEN A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD ELSE C.MSHP_GRADE_CD END) MSHIP_EXPT_GRADE_CD
, A.ADVNCMT_STA_SCORE NOW_ADVNCMT_STA_SCORE , A.ADVNCMT_END_SCORE NOW_ADVNCMT_END_SCORE , C.ADVNCMT_STA_SCORE , C.ADVNCMT_END_SCORE , C.EXTRC_STD_MONTH , A.EXTRC_STD_2_MONTH , C.REG_DT , C.EXTRC_KEEP_MONTH , A.GRADE_KEEP_SCORE NOW_GRADE_KEEP_SCORE , A.GRADE_KEEP_2_SCORE NOW_GRADE_KEEP_2_SCORE , C.GRADE_KEEP_SCORE , C.GRADE_KEEP_2_SCORE
/* , C.APPLY_STD_STA_YMD , C.APPLY_STD_END_YMD */
, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') APPLY_STD_STA_YMD , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS( SYSDATE , C.EXTRC_STD_2_MONTH ), 'YYYYMMDD') APPLY_STD_END_YMD
, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRM_CUST_GRADE_CHNG_HST Z WHERE Z.ITG_CUST_NO = A.ITG_CUST_NO AND Z.MSHP_GRADE_CD = A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD AND TO_CHAR(Z.REG_DT , 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS( SYSDATE , C.EXTRC_KEEP_MONTH * -1), 'YYYYMMDD') ) CHK_KEEP , (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '01' = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'UP' ELSE 'NO' END) UP_MONTH_YN
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.ITG_CUST_NO , A.MSHIP_TYPE_CD , A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD , B.ADVNCMT_STA_SCORE , B.ADVNCMT_END_SCORE , B.GRADE_KEEP_SCORE , B.GRADE_KEEP_2_SCORE , EXTRC_STD_2_MONTH , NVL( ( SELECT SUM( OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE ) FROM CRM_ADVNCMT_HST M WHERE TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE , ( SELECT DISTINCT EXTRC_STD_MONTH * -1 FROM CRM_MSHIP_PLCY_BAS D WHERE D.STATUS_CD = 'Y' AND ( D.MSHP_GRADE_CD = A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD /* OR D.CPRT_CMP_NO = A.CPRT_CMP_NO */ )
) ), 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR( M.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AND M.ITG_CUST_NO = A.ITG_CUST_NO ), 0) OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM
, NVL( ( SELECT SUM( OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE ) FROM CRM_ADVNCMT_HST M WHERE TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE , ( SELECT DISTINCT EXTRC_STD_2_MONTH*-1 FROM CRM_MSHIP_PLCY_BAS D WHERE D.STATUS_CD='Y' AND ( D.MSHP_GRADE_CD = A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD /* OR D.CPRT_CMP_NO = A.CPRT_CMP_NO */ )
) ), 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR( M.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AND M.ITG_CUST_NO = A.ITG_CUST_NO ), 0) OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM2
FROM CRM_CUST_BAS A LEFT JOIN CRM_MSHIP_PLCY_BAS B ON A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD = B.MSHP_GRADE_CD WHERE 1=1 AND A.MSHIP_SBSC_YN = 'Y' AND /* 승급점수는 골드등 회원등급만 해당 됨 */ B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD='003' AND B.STATUS_CD='Y'
/* 테스트 시에만
AND A.MSHIP_EXPT_GRADE_CD IS NULL AND A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD IN ( '002' )
AND A.ITG_CUST_NO = 'CST22071411013484378' */
) A LEFT JOIN CRM_MSHIP_PLCY_BAS C ON ( C.ADVNCMT_STA_SCORE <= A.OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM AND C.ADVNCMT_END_SCORE >= A.OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM ) WHERE A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD IS NOT NULL
AND A.MSHIP_GRADE_CD != C.MSHP_GRADE_CD AND C.MSHIP_GRADE_CD='003' AND C.STATUS_CD = 'Y' ) Z
WHERE Z.CHK_KEEP = 0 OR (
( NOW_MSHIP_GRADE_CD != MSHIP_EXPT_GRADE_CD ) OR Z.OCCUR_ADVNCMT_SCORE_SUM2 <= Z.NOW_GRADE_KEEP_SCORE )

insert.foreach:
INSERT /* CampCpnPntIssue.pubPoint */ INTO CRM_POINT_HST ( POINT_HST_SEQ, ITG_CUST_NO, CHIT_NO, PBLS_DIV_CD, OCCUR_POINT_SCORE, REMAIN_POINT_SCORE , VALID_PERD_STA_YMD, VALID_PERD_END_YMD, PBLS_DT, PBLS_CHL_CD, CAMP_NO , AMDR_ID, AMD_DT, REGR_ID, REG_DT, REG_CHL_CD, STOR_NO, USE_TYPE_CD )
SELECT FN_CRM_AUTO_SEQ('PNT'), #{item.itgCustNo} ITG_CUST_NO, FN_CRM_AUTO_SEQ('CPT') CHIT_NO, '970' PBLS_DIV_CD
, NVL( SUM_REMAIN_POINT_SCORE, 0) OCCUR_POINT_SCORE , NVL( MY_REMAIN_POINT_SCORE, 0) + NVL( SUM_REMAIN_POINT_SCORE, 0) REMAIN_POINT_SCORE , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') VALID_PERD_STA_YMD , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 24 ),'YYYYMMDD') VALID_PERD_END_YMD , SYSDATE, 'CRM' PBLS_CHL_CD, NULL CAMP_NO , NULL AMDR_ID, NULL AMD_DT, 'CRM' REGR_ID, SYSDATE REG_DT, 'CRM' REG_CHL_CD, '141359' STOR_NO, '002' USE_TYPE_CD
FROM (
SELECT NVL(( SELECT REMAIN_POINT_SCORE FROM ( SELECT REMAIN_POINT_SCORE FROM CRM_POINT_HST C WHERE C.ITG_CUST_NO = #{item.itgCustNo} ORDER BY C.POINT_HST_SEQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM=1 ), 0) MY_REMAIN_POINT_SCORE , SUM_REMAIN_POINT_SCORE FROM ( SELECT NVL( SUM(buy_advncmt_point_score) , 0 ) SUM_REMAIN_POINT_SCORE FROM CRM_MSHIP_PLCY_BAS WHERE STATUS_CD = 'Y' AND MSHP_GRADE_CD IS NOT NULL AND ( MSHP_GRADE_CD <= #{item.mshipExptGradeCd} AND MSHP_GRADE_CD > #{item.nowMshipGradeCd} ) ) ) Z

mapper.insert:
INSERT /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.MsgIfDao.insertAdvnMsg */ INTO EON.MSG_IF (
CLIENT /*CLIENT */ , CAMPAIGN_ID /*CAMPAIGN_ID */ , MEMBER_SEQ /*MEMBER_SEQ */ , SEND_TYPE /*SEND_TYPE */ , SUBJECT /*SUBJECT */ , MSG /*MSG */ , DESTEL /*DESTEL */ , SRCTEL /*SRCTEL */ , RESERVETIME /*RESERVETIME */ , SENDRESULT /*SENDRESULT */ , ETC3 /*ETC3 */ , DUMMY9 /*DUMMY4 */ , DUMMY10 /*DUMMY5 */ , SENDER_KEY /*SENDER_KEY */ , TEMPLATE_CODE /*TEMPLATE_CODE */ , K_MSG /*K_MSG */ , K_RESERVETIME /*K_RESERVETIME */ , K_ERR_ISSEND /*K_ERR_ISSEND */ , MSG_TYPE /*MSG_TYPE */ , KKO_HEADER /*KKO_HEADER */ , KKO_BTN_TYPE /*KKO_BTN_TYPE */ , KKO_BTN_INFO /*KKO_BTN_INFO */ , IMG_URL /*IMG_URL */ , IMG_LINK /*IMG_LINK */ , K_TITLE /*K_TITLE */ , AD_FLAG /*AD_FLAG */ , REV_ID /*REV_ID */
)
SELECT 'CRM' client , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) || ROWNUM campainId , ROWNUM memberSeq , '2' sendType , B.SUBJECT , FN_ADVN_MSG( C.ITG_CUST_NO , C.CUST_NM , ( SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS F WHERE F.TOP_COMN_CD = 'MB020' AND F.COMN_CD = A.MSHP_GRADE_CD ) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.APPLY_STD_END_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') , B.CONTENT ) MSG
, DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', C.MPHON_NO , '') DESTEL , '15775570' SRCTEL , TO_CHAR( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') || '10:00:00') RESERVETIME , 'K' , 'crm_1' , null dummy9 , A.ITG_CUST_NO DUMMY10 , B.SEND_PROFILE_KEY , B.TEMPLATE_CODE , FN_ADVN_MSG( C.ITG_CUST_NO , C.CUST_NM , ( SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS F WHERE F.TOP_COMN_CD = 'MB020' AND F.COMN_CD = A.MSHP_GRADE_CD ) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.APPLY_STD_END_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') , B.CONTENT ) K_MSG , TO_CHAR( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') || '10:00:00') K_RESERVETIME , 'Y' K_ERR_ISSEND , 'AT' MSG_TYPE , NULL KKO_HEADER , NULL KKO_BTN_TYPE , BTN_INFO KKO_BTN_INFO , NULL IMG_URL , NULL IMG_LINK , B.SUBJECT K_TITLE , NULL AD_FLAG , A.ITG_CUST_NO REV_ID
FROM CRM_CUST_GRADE_CHNG_HST A LEFT JOIN EON.KKO_TMPL_BASE B ON 1=1 LEFT JOIN CRM_CUST_BAS C ON A.ITG_CUST_NO = C.ITG_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN CRM_COMN_CD_BAS D ON B.TEMPLATE_CODE = D.RFRN_1_COMN_CD WHERE B.TEMPLATE_CODE = 'CRM_0010' AND NVL( D.RFRN_7_COMN_CD , 'N') = 'Y' /* 참조7 포인트 발송 유무 Y 사용, N 미사용 */ AND A.MSHP_GRADE_CD != A.CHNG_PRE_MSHP_GRADE_CD /* 혹여나 등급이 변경 전후가 같은 멤버십 일 경우 문자 안 보내기 */ AND TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT , 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
